title: Club that i own no longer appears in club section in new client
body:
So, My club on OCE (W1LD) still exists, as my friend are in it, and it says that I am still in it (according to my friends).

The issue is that i no longer can see it, or view who is online in it.

Is there a way to fix this?

Server - OCE
Name - Timmeh
Club - Going Wild! (W1LD)

replies.body: There was a club outage a while back that caused some issues like the one you're reporting.  It should have been resolved, so it's we'd like to take a look at your specific issue to see what the deal is.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll help individually.  We'll get back to you!
